message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering this product to you for $12000, reflecting its true value and the benefits it will bring to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $12000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for it. This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing me to acquire the product and you to make a good sale.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. I am willing to negotiate further. Therefore, I am now offering the product to you for $10500. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your financial situation.
